Reviews.Title: Sansui TV
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Good value, easy to set up, and clear picture.  No problems whatsoever and would recommend highly.  Also, the remote code is carried by Direct TV, which is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality and even poorer customer service
Reviews.Author: Alexokerry "Alexokerry"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV on sale at the local Shopko when my ten-year-old RCA finally bought the farm.  It have a wonderful picture and I could actually see the sub-titles on the foreign language films that I watch.  It was a dream.  Until last night... one of my cats unplugged the TV and when we plugged it back in, nadda, nicht, nein, nyet!  The red light would come on, but the idiot box wouldn't turn on.  Called customer service, they're only open 8am to 8pm Monday through Friday.  As if people don't watch TV on the weekends.  Called the store this morning and got a new one.  But I will never buy another Sansui product again.  And believe me, if we hadn't already pitch the older TV, we'd have been using that until I got paid at the end of the week.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive TV works well w/basic cable
Reviews.Author: E. J. Tomlinson
Reviews.Content: I usually choose Sony but purchased this based on the salespersons suggestion. It was easy to set up & choose channels. I have basic cable & now have access to great digital TV. I paid $329 at ShopKo, a local store, and know that I can return it easily if I encounter problems. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: This TV is Great
Reviews.Author: SuzieQGirl
Reviews.Content: Did not realize this was available from Amazon.  Purchased from BJ's wholesale Club and the picture is beautiful.  Hooked right up to our Verizon FIOS and we couldn't be more pleased.  Not a tech. person, so if we missed something, we don't know it!  We paid about $20. less at BJ's.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Tweety "no name"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchase.  TV was delivered very fast. Have had no problems with the TV.  Color is very good and the picture is sharp. I am glad I purchased this TV.

Reviews.Title: Dead 1 year, 3 months later
Reviews.Author: santajp
Reviews.Content: I got this TV (new) for Christmas 2011. One year and 3 months later (February 2013) the tuner suddenly dropped dead; it no longer functions as a TV. When it was alive, it had a nice enough picture for the price. As others have mentioned, the sound was muddy no matter which setting I put it on.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: DO NOT buy this TV. We purchased it a year ago and it would worked for 6 months and would NOT turn on, we didn't move it, drop it or anything it just simple STOPPED WORKING. Piece of junk. I will NEVER buy a Sansui product again. Do yourself a favor and do something different!

Reviews.Title: Worked for 3 weeks- won't turn on
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Just purchased an RV with this tv included. Now been in use 3 weeks and wouldn't  turn on. Unplugged for one hour to reset (no button) and it worked for two days and back to not turning on. Keystone RV quit using this brand if that tells you anything. Junk.

Reviews.Title: The picture quality and durability is pretty decent, however that tv base is awful
Reviews.Author: Dominique Tate "sPriTChiCk"
Reviews.Content: My lcd tv, is not an amazon product.  I actually purchased from best buy...can't remember how much but it was on sale.  Had it since early 2012 and is quite reliable.  However, the wobble tv base it came with makes the unit lean forward.  No matter what we tried to do to remedy this it is persistent.  I am looking to use a wall mount instead, hoping that would allow for easier tv watching for my children.....it's their tv.

Reviews.Title: sansui HDLCD3250 32 INCH 720P LCD TV
Reviews.Author: greg @memphis, Tn
Reviews.Content: AN EXCELLENT TV SET EASY SETUP,EXCELLENT PICTURE QUALITY good price by AMAZON 2 DAY DELIVERY. SOUND QUALITY IS GOOD FOR THE PRICE OF THIS SET.

Reviews.Title: Sansui HDLCD3250
Reviews.Author: Ligi
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV mark based in its experience since 1942. I paid $323 for a Sansui HDLCD3250, 32" and I'm very happy!!

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: wayne lamont
Reviews.Content: We received this TV as a gift for our daughter.  When we plugged it in there was a black line across the screen then the screen went black.  Tried to return it to the store but it had been over 60 days since purchase so they would not exchange it.  We called customer service and they told us they would not exchange it but they would pay to have it repaired.  The repair shop was an hour away and took two months to complete.  After we picked it up from the shop the TV lasted one night and now will not turn at all.  Tried customer service again and they said to unplug it for an hour to reset the circuitry.  We'll see if that works.  Next time will make sure to buy a better brand.  Will not buy Sansui again.  Poor quality and customer service.Uplugging it and resetting the circuit did not work.  Called customer service again and they want us to return the t.v. to the repair shop that could not fix it in the first place.  Horrible product from a company that does not stand behind their product.  Avoid this company!!!

Reviews.Title: Cloudy screen...
Reviews.Author: RickyC
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these televisions (not from amazon), had it for about 2 weeks and noticed when it went into letterbox there was a "cloudy" sort of light appearing from the bottom of the screen that wasn't there when I bought it.The tv had a great picture before then but had to be returned 2 weeks in after purchase.

Reviews.Title: Dead Pixels
Reviews.Author: Raegan Webb
Reviews.Content: I got this TV as a gift on Christmas. It was easy to hook up and has been a great TV. Until now I've been happy with it but I've only had it for a little over a month now and there's a row of dead pixels running all the way from the top to the bottom of the screen. Aside from that this has been a great TV and I'm pretty bummed about it because it's hard to watch without seeing it now.

ProductInfo.Features:
32-Inch widescreen TFT LCD (720p) is DTV-ready with dual ATSC/NTSC tuners
Brightness 400cd/m2
3D Comb Filter
Wall Mount Vesa(200 x 100)
Energy Star compliant
ProductInfo.Name: Sansui HDLCD3250 32-Inch 720p LCD TV
